body:
IIUC, the algorithm here is, use quantization_infer_backwards_[output_tensor] to populate the range information of the input tensor, but only do this once. What if there are multiple hops, e.g. `tensor1->reshape1->tensor2->identity1->tensor3` and we only know the range of `tensor3`? And what if `tensor1` is an input of a different `reshape2` to `tensor4`?

It looks like the right way would be:
```
while (not more range information are added) {
  do infer backwards
  do infer forwards
}
```
what do you think? Thanks.
